programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep702
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bubble Monkeys - Ryder and the Pups visit Tracker and Carlos in the jungle, a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky trouble!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Party Time - Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip / Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Pups Save Old Trusty - Ryder and the pups need to unplug Old Trusty the geyser to stop water sprouting up all over town.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep305
programme.desc: The Crystal Of Strength / Clamity - Injured from training and eager to feel strong again, Rammy gets the squad to go in search of the legendary Crystal of Strength on Sparkle Island. // When Steel takes a pearl from a clam, it chases him through the city to try and get the pearl back.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training - The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pony - Priscilla the pony gets the chance to help the Paw Patrol rescue their own vehicle after they help her out of a canyon.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep502
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover - When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour / Honey Bear / The Science Pair - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park. // When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend. // Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep204
programme.desc: The Trials of the Pirate Protector - On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep210
programme.desc: The TIme Capsule - Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep619
programme.desc: Snow Rescue Blaze - When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep620
programme.desc: Megabot! - Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep508
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery / Paddington And The Fossil Hunt - What's making the strange noises in the cave? Jonathan thinks it's a mermaid, but Paddington isn't so sure // Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, everyone else seems to be getting lucky except her, can Paddington help?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S4 Ep417

programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep306
programme.desc: Baby Steel / Joke's On You - When Steel accidentally turns himself into a baby, he wreaks havoc on Platinum City. // It's the annual "Day of Fun"! However when Ricardo and Trickalien play the ultimate prank on the Deer Squad, the day of fun soon turns into a day of chaos!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington Vs The Seagulls / Paddington And The Lighthouse - Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot? // The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Pups Save a Robosaurus - When a homemade Robotic Dino named Earl comes to life, the pups need to find him, stop him, and bring him home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep524
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot - Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Ultimate Hype Bear / The Chrysalis Crew / Just Say No - Bissy is meeting her favorite band, but Bossy tags along. // Bossy and Turtle find a chrysalis. // Turtle has trouble telling his friends no.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep206
programme.desc: The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure - Santiago and his family team up to save the Fruit Festival when Enrique crashes the party and steals all the fruit! // The crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure, but when the boys fall asleep it's up to the girls to save the day!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Hiccup Soup - When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep501
programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep622
programme.desc: Lifeguard Blaze! - Today, Blaze and AJ are on a mission to become Lifeguards. But it'll take four daring rescues to achieve their official Lifeguard badge and only the bravest monster trucks have what it takes.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep623
programme.desc: Campfire Stories - It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee / Pups Save Breakfast - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Detective Baby Shark - When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper - Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep404
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Quest for the Crown - Chase and the team are called to Barkingburg to keep an eye on the crown.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep407
programme.desc: Mission PAW: Royally Spooked! / Pups Save Monkey-Dinger - Another Mission PAW to Barkingburg! The Princess thinks she's seen a ghost, and the PAW Patrol needs to get to the bottom of it. // While on safari with Carlos and Tracker, Mayor Humdinger steals a magic mask.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Prank Day - Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep124
programme.desc: A Present for Ron - Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Pups Save a Film Festival - The pups are shooting their Film Festival entry until Daring Danny X cuts the action with his dangerous stunt.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep94
programme.desc: Day Trip - The Teletubbies go on a day trip to the Hidey Hup. They take turns on The Tubby Bouncy, The Tubby Slidey and The Tubby Spinny before they go on The Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Tiger - Dee encourages a friend to say 'tiger' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a stripy tiger, a swimming tiger, a cheeky tiger and Dee even has a tea party with a tiger!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Downhill Racers - It's the annual go-kart race, and Zip has chosen the racecourse, but is worried it isn't as fun as the ones before, so he tries to make the racecourse more exciting.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Building Bridges - Messy and his friends are joined by a group of robots when they build a bridge. Stan Tall puts it to the test.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Clothes for Jimmy - The Kazoops are going shopping after Stan shrinks everyone's clothes in the wash, but when Monty is told Jimmy Jones won't be getting any new clothes, he begins to question why animals don't wear clothes just like humans do.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - It's time for a family game of hide and seek. Everyone hides, while Bluey counts to twenty, but will she be able to stay focused on the game and not get distracted by all her toys.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep39
programme.desc: The Recipe Badge - The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they aren't sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep38
programme.desc: The Nature Badge - The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, don't interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep37
programme.desc: The Dos and Don'ts Badge - The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Wimbledon, England - The Go Jetters are at Centre Court in Wimbledon to watch the world's most famous tennis tournament.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Great Mosque of Djenne, Africa - Grandmaster Glitch is invited to Djenne in Mali, Africa, to visit the people and to see one of his favourite things at work - mud.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Mums and Dads - When Indy and Rusty play Mums and Dads, they can't agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Early Baby - Bluey's playgroup is at odds when Indy's baby hospital collides with Rusty's knights and dragons. But in explaining themselves, they both find that their games actually have a lot in common.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Andy and the Damselflies - Andy jets off to the South of France to see where damselflies lay their eggs.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Racing Machines - Grace shows off three amazing racing machines! Grace speeds round her speed track in a touring car.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep20
programme.desc: Uncle Joe King - Captain Captain's Uncle Joe King is coming to visit. Uncle Joe is the best joker in the family and Captain Captain has got a big plan to play a joke on him!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep21
programme.desc: The Collecting Badge - Duggee is cleaning his biscuit tin collection, and the squirrels are inspired to make their own collections and then display their precious things in the clubhouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep20
programme.desc: The Yoga Badge - The squirrels are all hyped up with bundles of energy. Things are starting to get a bit frantic, and Duggee needs to calm them all down. Fortunately, he has his Yoga Badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep19
programme.desc: The River Badge - Duggee has a package that needs delivering right at the other end of the river. It looks like the squirrels are going to have a day out on the boat! Good job Duggee has his River badge!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Kinderdijk, Netherlands - The Go Jetters travel to Kinderdijk in The Netherlands to celebrate National Mill Day.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Leshan Giant Buddha, China - The Go Jetters master the art of mindfulness to save the Giant Buddha of Leshan in China.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep10
programme.desc: Victor Says Yes - Victor agrees to fix almost every engine in Sodor on the same day; he learns that it is okay to say no sometimes.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Castle Scribbling - Whilst visiting a Castle, Sarah & Duck's drawings lead them to an exciting discovery.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Pillow Fill - Scarf Lady helps Sarah & Duck catch the fluffs and puffs to refill their pancaked pillows.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hot Foot - When the sand heats up, Nelly and Nora hot foot it around the beach.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Dog Loves Treasure - Dog and Pug arrive on a desert island and find a pirate who has lost his treasure.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cosmic Clean Up - When Stan and Violet ask Monty to tidy his room, they suggest he turn it into a game to make it more fun, but Monty begins to question whether it's possible to turn a task like tidying into a game.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep9
programme.desc: It's time to grow a flower - JoJo tries to grow a daffodil but is disheartened to learn that it will take a long time to bloom. Cynthia and Gran Gran show JoJo how to take care of it and the best way to measure its growth.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Scrub-A-Dub-Pup - Granny Po loves her puppy, but her puppy loves lying in a muddy flowerbed. Can the team help her out of this muddle?

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Three Cheers for Logi-Po - When Logi-Po passes an important test, the team organise a po-fect celebration.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Handstand - At a party, Bingo is desperate to show off her handstand skills, while Nanna can't find a way to make herself useful. They're both feeling a bit lost, until they find each other.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep18
programme.desc: The Making Friends Badge - The squirrels make new friends, play games and have a picnic at a Jamboree. They meet another group of young animals with their very own version of Duggee but everything they do is different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Camping Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are going camping, so they build a tent. Then the squirrels hear a scary noise outside the tent. What can it be? All sorts of things are imagined. DUGGEE!!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep16
programme.desc: The Medicine Badge - Duggee's not very well, he's lost his voice. The squirrels want to make him feel better. Duggee tries to tell them that he needs some water but the squirrels don't quite understand.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch - When a storm washes up plastic litter onto the Academy beach, the Go Jetters leave Ubercorn, Grandmaster Glitch and the cadets behind and head to the North Pacific Ocean in Jet Pad.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Mudslide - It's a very rainy day at the Go Jet Academy and the Go Jetters are teaching the Cadets some crucial Go Jetter skills.

programme.title: The Numtums S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Numpups Can't Fly - Little Sandy decides she wants to fly just like Super Numtum.

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Kitchen Cabinet Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Former Home Affairs Minister and Liberal MP Karen Andrews has announced she will resign at the next election and in this candid interview she describes why Parliament House is the most sexist environment she's ever worked in.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Bricklayer Greg and his partner Emma tear down their South Melbourne laneway townhouse to build a 3-level home out of brick. They invite their extended family to help out with Emma's parents assigned the entire ground floor.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Richard and Denise own 14 hotels so it is no surprise that when it came to designing their new house in a prime location high up in the Adelaide hills, their inspiration would come from the buildings that they love.

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2021 - Hard people for a hard land. Narriearra Station sprawls across 150,000 hectares in a remote New South Wales. After more than a century its becoming a national park rich in flora and fauna and Indigenous and pastoral history.

programme.title: Bradman And Tendulkar
programme.desc: Two of cricket's greatest players, sporting icons from different corners of the world. This documentary compares their early lives, stellar careers and dreams, uncovering striking similarities and never-before-shared details.

programme.title: ABC News Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The Pacific: Summer Special Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - A look back at some of our favourite stories from the Pacific. We go to Solomon Islands where the legacy of WWII is still felt. Plus we hear from two Pacific music legends Jean Gabilou and American Idol winner Iam Tongi.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Mariam Saab presents the day's news and reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Chas and John are back by the fake fireplace in the fauv-val Office to take a deeper look at the 2024 Presidential race and the week's news in the US. There's only days until the first in the nation Iowa Caucus. (Return)

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Gail force winds tear across the outback. Kurt must prioritise the safety of his team. Liz Cook has her first time mustering as a helicopter pilot. Clarry lets nature do the hard work, using fire to lure and trap cattle.

programme.title: Designing A Legacy Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In Designing a Legacy, architectural nerd Tim Ross travels the length and breadth of the country seeking an alternate story of Australia; one that shows how great design better connects us to place and to each other.

programme.title: Great Australian Stuff Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Tony Armstrong explores all the stuff from the land that's become iconic and recognisable as Great Australian Stuff - including the boomerang, the Akubra and the Permanent Pleat.

programme.title: Alone Australia Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Just three people remain alone in the Tasmanian wilderness. They have no idea how many others are left, heightening the daily challenge - is the end a day away, or 6 months?

programme.title: Australian Story Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Love, loss and sailing the world solo: Jessica Watson takes us inside her amazing voyage as a teenage sailor, speaks about the grief of losing her partner, and a new feature film which has thrust her back into the spotlight.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Hopes for a change in fortune after a tumultuous year for sheep farmers, how sanctuary life is causing a critically endangered creature to lose its street smarts, and buckle in as we meet the desert daredevils of Finke.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - How consultants infiltrated government. Firms push ethical boundaries and cost billions of dollars with little transparency and almost no accountability. We reveal accusations of wasted public money and conflicts of interest.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Heather Ewart heads to Tasmania with two intrepid line dancers who are on a boot scootin' line dancing tour of the nation holding 'Hoedowns for country towns', lifting spirits and raising money to help others, along the way.

programme.title: Alone Australia Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Just three people remain alone in the Tasmanian wilderness. They have no idea how many others are left, heightening the daily challenge - is the end a day away, or 6 months?

programme.title: UFC 290: Volkanovski vs. Rodriguez
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC 290: Volkanovski vs. Rodriguez is an upcoming event headlined by a featherweight title fight between champion Alexander Volkanovski and challenger Yair Rodriguez. programme.title: UFC 296: Edwards vs. Covington

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC257PoiriervsMcGregor2
programme.desc: UFC The Walk gives fight fans a retrospective look back at some of the most iconic moments in combat sports history. Re-live the experience of UFC champions and challengers as they prepare for their biggest fights, and get an in-depth look at their performances inside the Octagon.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep403UsmanvsBurns
